body.name: Rugs-Ultra Soft Indoor Modern Area Rugs Fluffy Living Room Carpets for Children Bedroom Home Decor Nursery Rug (2x4 Feet,Beige)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 19 mins
features: EXTRA SOFT AREA RUG: DIWU area rug is incredibly soft and features a top layer of fluffy material with sponge interlayer, which is softer and more luxurious underfoot. Its comfy fabric is very family-friendly and ideal for indoor use in the bedroom, living room.

THOUSANDS OF NON SLIP DOTS: Our fluffy carpet is back with thousands of non slip grip dots that help hold in place on wooden or other materials floor, and hold up even with kids and pets. This fluffy carpet is a great decor for the kids bedroom, nursery, classroom and dorm.

VARIOUS SIZES and MORDERN DESIGN: Our large and generously And provide a variety of sizes. Each rug with a simple design in solid color, to create a peaceful atmosphere for your master bedroom, home office, or dining room.

EASY TO CLEAN: Simply vacuum with a hand-held vacuum. For a deeper clean, wipe with a damp cloth and mild soap. Allow your shag rug to fully air dry before next use. Do not use bleach. The rug pack with a vacuum bag, the thickness will recover within two days, please don't worry.

DIWU modern indoor rug is designed for luxurious feeling and comfort. Soft to the touch, warm and beautiful, not shed and not fade, skin-friendly. If you are at all unsatisfied, please contact us and we will be happy to assist you.
body.description: High-quality life, start from the faux fluffy area rug. Give you the ideal home decor. Comfortable and luxurious fuzzy rug for your any style home decor. The top layer is a fluffy material and the inter layer is memory sponge. The rug for bedside is beyond soft and comfy.Have a non slip surface on the rug's back. Let your children and pets can safely play on the fur carpets.There are many colors and sizes of the decorative accent floor carpets for you to choose from.Adopt sponge hemlock technology, durable lasting. REMIND: Not machine washable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diwu Luxury Soft Fluffy Area Rug, Perfect Home Decor Do you feel like your living room is missing something? Shaggy area rugs for living rooms can infuse your space with comfort and warmth. The luxurious feel of a shag rug can make any room feel fancier. Get ready to slip off your shoes and bury your toes in the plush pile. Believe us, you'll love what shag area rugs can bring to your home.

Shopping instructions: 1. Our area rug is compressed in a vacuum bag, it will fluffed back up in a couple of days, please do not worry about this situation. 2. Please wash the carpets according to the instructions of the washing. Do not insolate after washing. 3. If you find some smell of the product when receiving it, it's a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage, just please expose it to the air for some time. 4. Due to the different lighting effects of the monitor and camera, the image may be slightly different from the actual color of the product. High-quality life, start from the faux fluffy area rug. Give you the ideal home decor. Comfortable and luxurious fuzzy rug for your any style home decor. The top layer is a fluffy material and the inter layer is memory sponge. The rug for bedside is beyond soft and comfy.Have a non slip surface on the rug's back. Let your children and pets can safely play on the fur carpets.There are many colors and sizes of the decorative accent floor carpets for you to choose from.Adopt sponge hemlock technology, durable lasting. REMIND: Not machine washable

KID AND PET FRIENDLY We know the family and children is very important for you and that is why our rugs are made of 100% polyester materials. All our rugs are kid and pet friendly! HIGH PILE CARPET The surface 1.57" high velvet pile is not only given a soft feeling but also keeps your feet from the cold floor, helping reduce noise from walking. NO-SHEDDING Benefit from individual spindle drives technology in winding along with Ring Spun Yarn, enhance the twist to hold all the fibers together to make the yarn sturdier and less prone to shedding, and make it a nice decorative rug for medium traffic areas. STAYS IN PLACE Thousands of tiny, durable PVC dots will help to prevent the carpet from sliding around on your floors. Before placing the rug on the floor, please ensure the floor underneath the rug is clean and dry.

THE MOST POPULAR CONCERNS 1.How to clean it? We suggest you clean by below steps: Shaking it off to get extra debris out. Then use a low-power vacuum cleaner. You could add some mild detergent and gently wash the carpet by hand, then put the rug in the ventilation to dry. 2.Is it the same thickness as the picture? No, it has creases and the rug fibers don't look fluffy. As these rugs are vacuum packed, they need to be put flat for a week to recover to their original thickness, we are very sorry to bring you some inconvenience. 3.Is the bottom of the rug slippery? Depending on the material on which the carpet is placed, the bottom is recommended to use a non-slip pad or use carpet tape to fix it, which can better play the role of anti-slip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our 8 year old loves this rug and our son even loves laying on it because it's so soft. It's new, but overall seems like we made the right choice with this product. No complaints at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So thin and cheaply made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thought the fiber/yarn would be thicker/fuller. But, rug does it job. I have not washed rug yet thus neutral rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks melted and pulled after only 3 washing’s
reviews.reviewText: Cute but quality is poor. The backing shows through after one washing. Did not machine dry but needed extensive fluffing. Too high maintenance and just does not look nice after about 3 months

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son’s room and when I unboxed the item from the vacuum seal bag it was in. It immediately started to fall apart. I had to take it outside to shake it. It is super soft, but hard to clean and easy to start shedding everywhere. The appearance is small and flimsy. And leaves the “fur” everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The colour is good
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The color is good, lavender, purple like a pony. The carpet is not as fluffy and dense as in the photo in the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars A bit disappointing.
reviews.reviewText: It looks pretty but again it’s very thin and flimsy and it doesn’t even reach 4 feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft like expected
reviews.reviewText: This rug is perfect for my cozy corner in my classroom. The color is true and it added more comfort for under the tent.
